snippet: Ike Davis hit a cathartic three-run home run to lead the Mets to a much-needed 11-2 win over the Rays, snapping a three-game losing streak.
abstract: New York Mets defeat Tampa Bay Rays, 11-2.
lead_paragraph: Ike Davis hit a cathartic three-run home run to lead the Mets to a much-needed 11-2 win over the Rays, snapping a three-game losing streak.

headline.seo: Mets Rout Rays to End Three-Game Slide
headline.main: Mets Win an Easy One for a Change
headline.print_headline: Offense Helps Mets Win Easy One for a Change
